attributes.review: I opened the app for the first time, and it immediately crashed. Then I tried again, and it crashed. Finally, on my 3rd try I was able to get in but then the second I got it on it froze and I had to close the app. On my fourth time opening the app, it did not crash or freeze and I was finally able to see the graphics. However they were absolutely terrible and they looked like they were designed by a child. The app also detected my location and it told me that it was sending me a representative to finish setting it up. However, the person they sent was my annoying teacher from school and I slammed the door on her. Over all a terrible experience and I would not recommend to anyone.
attributes.title: Complete Disappointment

attributes.review: Did you ever hear the Tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise? No. I thought not. Itâ€™s not a story the Jedi would tell you. It's a Sith legend. Darth Plagueis was a Dark Lord of the Sith, so powerful and so wise he could use the Force to influence the midichlorians to create life... He had such a knowledge of the dark side that he could even keep the ones he cared about from dying. He could actually save save people from death? The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. What happened to him? He became so powerful... the only thing he was afraid of was losing his power, which eventually, of course, he did. Unfortunately, he taught his apprentice everything he knew, then his apprentice killed him in his sleep. It's ironic he could save others from death, but not himself.
attributes.title: Nope

attributes.review: My experience on this app was terrible. As a patriotic Southern woman, I downloaded this to get the latest news from the Trump administration insupport of our president. Instead, all I got was this terrible manifesto about a race war! I thought it might have been a virus/that cute mysterious hacker man with the mask trying to make the president look bad. I re-downloaded the app and it came back to normal with â€˜Trump 2020â€™ signs. Then while I gave my little boy Timmy my phone to play Angry Birds, he comes up and asks me about  the picture on this app. Thatâ€™s when I realized my poor little baby was exposed to a picture of President Trumpâ€™s little cheeto!!ğŸ˜±ğŸ˜± I then got a notification to send my own son to Epsteinâ€™s old trafficking island!ğŸ˜° My family was forced to move to another countryğŸ˜

attributes.review: From the moment i downloaded this app things started to occur. First my pet fish ran away, then my stuffed animals all died, THEN my phone started to glitch out so much and any time i would try to open it to see something about my most favorite prez of all time, eventually causing my phone to burst into flames and completely evaporate. But the troubles did not stop there. I soon ran out into the street in frustration due to this app and got hit by a fly causing me to fall over and break all of my limbs. After spending some time in the street i proceeded to flatline and have yet to recover. This app is a danger to society and if anyone out there actually cares about the citizens in this country this app should be taken off of the app store and banned from all devices.
